markdownContent: “You must be the new intern! I'm Timea Ricci, the curator for this museum. My specialty is early modern European history. I'm currently working on an exhibition of everyday objects and am still collecting some things. Maybe you can help me? I have this dataset of a mortar here, which I found in our database. I'd like to use it in the exhibition, but I'm not sure what it looks like because the dataset doesn't have a picture. This makes it all the more difficult. Maybe you can figure out which of these mortars is the right one?”
